heading: HB00820
0: AN ACT GRANTING CIVIL SERVICE ELIGIBILITY TO CONTRACTUAL AND CO-TERMINUS GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES WHO HAVE RENDERED A TOTAL OF FIVE (5) YEARS OF EFFICIENT SERVICE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
